transforms.code: return value if value != '-1' else int(value)

from com.inductiveautomation.ignition.gateway import IgnitionGateway
	context = IgnitionGateway.get()
	toOption = lambda x: {'label': x.getName(), 'value': '[{}]'.format(x.getName())}
	return [toOption(provider) for provider in context.getTagManager().getTagProviders() if provider.getName() != 'System']

script_samples.script:
import json
		
	# Define the URL of your endpoint
	url = "http://127.0.0.1:6000/ask_question"
	
	# Your data payload with database details and the question
	data = {
	    "database": "my-db",
	    "username": "admin",
	    "password": "admin",
	    "host": "localhost",
	    "port": "5432",
	    "question": str(self.getSibling("Question").props.text)
	}
	json_data = json.dumps(data)
	
	try:
	    client = system.net.httpClient()
	    response = client.post(url, data=json_data, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'})
	    if response.statusCode == 200:
	        jsonResponse = response.json
	        self.getSibling("Response").props.text = jsonResponse['response']
	    else:
	        system.perspective.print("Error:", response.statusCode, response.text)
	except Exception as e:
	    system.perspective.print("Error making the request:", str(e))

name = self.view.params.item.lower()
	view = name.split(" ")[0]
	item = '{0}-item'.format(view)
	exchange.cmms.ui.navigate.goTo(item, {'id': -1})
